definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: whisper, charm (NH id.; Aram. [[לְחַשׁ]] lh.a4; Eth. lah.asa; whisper, v. RS:JPh xiv. 1885, 122, possibly originally serpent-charming);—

definitions.title: Pi.
definitions.body: Pt. pl. [[קוֹל מְלַחֲשִׁים]] Ps 58:6 voice of whisperers (i.e. serpent-charmers; ‖[[חוֹבֵר תֲבָרִים]]).

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: whisper together, Impf. [[יִתְלַחֲשׁוּ]] c. [[עַל]] Ps 41:8; Pt. pl. [[מִתְלַחֲשִׁים]] 2Sa 12:19.
